displayAddress: - 2nd Floor, 3 Furzeground Way, at Stockley Park, Uxbridge UB11 1EZ.
detailedDescription: 5,471 sq ft / 508 sq m Office Suite - 2nd Floor, 3 Furzeground Way, at Stockley Park, Uxbridge UB11 1EZ. 3 Furzeground Way is a 78,000 sq ft prestige glass fronted, 3 story Office building set back from the road with extensive car parking facilities. It has raised floors and full air conditioning throughout. The building has been divided into various sized offices. There are 2 visitors’ car spaces. The 2nd floor suite has the benefit of 19 car spaces Stockley Park is the major 150 acre office park for Heathrow Airport and the West of London Area. Being only 7 minutes’ drive from the Airport, the park has attracted many international companies, including Apple, Toshiba, IBM and Cannon. The Park web site provides a large amount of information about extensive facilities and accessibility via public transport. www.stockleypark.co.uk . The layout plan above gives an indication as to how the unfitted 5,471 sq ft office suite could be arranged. The office is held on a FRI lease until the 13th of April 2019. The passing rent is £134,000 pa ex. The lease is available for immediate assignment.

displayAddress: Wexham Springs, Framewood Road, Nr Gerrards Cross, Bucks
detailedDescription: Wexham Springs, Framewood Road, Nr Gerrards Cross, Bucks - LET 2,456 sq ft-offices, Let. An open plan office suite of 2,456 sq ft is now available forming part of the Timberland EU HQ. Located only 3 miles north of Slough as one of a four building campus set in a wooded 40 acre park-often considered one of the finest office parks in the Country. The office space has a raised carpeted floor with a range of movable floor boxes installed, full 4 pipe air conditioning and metal ceiling tiles. Two WC units one of which doubles as a disabled toilet. A single range open kitchen area, with under work surface areas for a fridge and dish washing units. 10 car parking spaces located directly outside the suite entrance. There is also an overflow parking area at the entrance to the park. 24/7 Park Security with a range of video cameras located around the main building and car parking areas. There is flexibility in the lease terms from 3 to 7 years. Contact Robin Farmer 0207 437 1986 to arrange an inspection. 75-76 Wells Street, London, W1 - LET 1,890 sq. ft. 2nd floor offices (175.5 sq. m.) Location The property is located approximately 80 yards north of Oxford Street and is a few minutes walk from Oxford Circus Tube Station. The Property The property comprises of one half of the 2nd floor of the building. The suite is self contained having its own male and female toilets and a small kitchen to the rear. The main accommodation is divided into 2 glass partitioned offices fronting on to Wells Street along with another glass partitioned central office overlooking a light well. All of the area has a pale wooden floor with a suspended ceiling with fluorescent lighting and occasional spot lights. Terms My clients are prepared to sublet the property on an inclusive package at a rent of £45,000 per annum inclusive. The term of the tenancy to expire December quarter date 2004. Call Leopold Farmer about a longer lease. Legal Costs Each party to bear their own legal costs involved in the transaction. Viewing By arrangement through the sole agent: Leopold Farmer 020 7437 1986 Back to top

Chessington, 16,000 sq.ft factory Of interest to owner-occupiers, developers and investors Freehold 16,000 sq.ft, Cox lane, Chessington Location: The property is located on the wellknown Cox Lane Industrial Estate, located approximately 3/4 mile from the Tolworth junction of the A3 trunk road. Chessington North station is located some 3/4 mile away, and various buses pass up and down the road. The Property: The premises are comprised of a two-storey factory erected in the 1950/60s. The proerty has been fitted out so that there is a format of offices at 1st Floor and manufacturing and offices at Ground FLoor level. The proerty has the benefit of gasfired central heating throughout and an attractive parquet wooden flooring in all of the office areas. The floor areas are as follows: 1st floor 7.708 sq.ft 716sq.m Ground Floor manufacturing area 4,468 sq.ft 415sq.m Ground Floor offices 3,833 sq.ft 356 sq.m 6,009 sq.ft 487 sq.m There is a loading bay facility, and ample car parking surroundign the property. The total site area is approximately 0.5 acres. Adjacent Property: Our client also owns the adjacent 0.35 acres upon which is a single-storey open plan factory of some 9,500 sq.ft. This property could be added to the overall redevelopment site. Terms: The property is available on a freehold basis or leasehold basis. Our client would also consider a joint venture on a redevelopment of the site to create a campus office/hightech complex or any other resonable development proposition. Please contact the writer ti discuss the situation in greater detail. Please note: That any assignee must satisfy themselves with regards to the dimensions of the building size/site etc and that these particulars do not constitute or form any part of any offer or contract. Any rent, price or premium quoted in these particulars is exlusive of VAT unless specifically stated, otherwise we would stress that no tests have been carried out to ensure that heating, electrical or plumbing systems and equipment are fully operational. displayAddress: 5,500 sq.ft. factory143 Clocktower Road Isleworth, Middlesex
detailedDescription: 5,500 sq.ft. factory143 Clocktower Road Isleworth, Middlesex Location: The Clocktower Road Industrial Estate is located just North of the Junction of the A316 trunk road leading up to the M3 Motorway, and the A310 London Road/Twickenham Road leading to Isleworth town. Heathrow Airport is some 7 miles to the west and Central London circa 9 miles to the East. Situation: The property is located on a 5-acre industrial estate, located just off the junction of Worton Road and Twickenham Road. Isleworth Mainline station is approximately a mile away, and Hounslow East underground station, 1 1/2 miles. The Property: The premises comprise of a brick walled, lined asbestos sheet roofed factory. Loading doors are at the front and the side of the main factory area. A two-storey office section, which has been comprehensively upgraded, fronts the unit. A shared loading yard runs down the east of the property, which has a gate across it for additional security. The unit has been fitted out with comprehensive security system/alarm. There are steel plate chambers located behind the main loading doors to the front and to the rear of the property. In additional to normal offie area, there has been two additional environmentally controlled areas fitted out within the factory, this being for the sake of electronic component assembly. This could be an attraction to any company involved in the electronics fields who would benefit from the high security of the unit, along with its quality and environment. Dimensions: The lease states the gross external areas as being: Ground Floor Factory Area 4604 sq.ft Ground Floor Office Area 136sq.ft First Floor Office Area 781 sq.ft Total Area 5521 sq.ft The height to eaves is 11 ft. Car parking for circa 10 cars plus on site Terms: The property is held on a lease expiring on the 24th March 2005. The current rent passing is £37,267 p.a. exclusive. The next rent review is the 7th Decenber 2003. The property is available by way of an assignment of the current lease and a premium of £20,000 is required, subject to contract, for the benefit of fixtures and fittings and the value of this leasehold interest. Legal Costs: Each party to bear their own legal costs involved in this transaction. The ingoing tenant to bear the landlords legal costs involved in the granting of the assignment. Viewing: To view please contact the sole agent. Please note: That any assignee must satisfy themselves with regards to the dimensions of the building size/site etc and that these particulars do not constitute or form any part of any offer or contract. Any rent, price or premium quoted in these particulars is exlusive of VAT unless specifically stated, otherwise we would stress that no tests have been carried out to ensure that heating, electrical or plumbing systems and equipment are fully operational. displayAddress: Freehold 6,500 sq.ft Island Farm Avenue West Molesey, Surrey
detailedDescription: Freehold 6,500 sq.ft Island Farm Avenue West Molesey, Surrey Location: The property is located in a small cul-de-sac, known as Island Farm Road, which forms part of the major Central Avenue industrial estate of West Molesey. To the West lies the conurbations of Weybridge and Walton-on-Thames and to the East is Hampton Court and Kingston-Upon-Thames. Access to the A3 trunk road leading to the M25 is some fivr miles away, and the nearest junction of the M3 motorway is also five miles distant. Hersham and Hampton Court railway stations areboth approximatley a mile to 1 1/2 miles distant. The Property: The premises comprise of a brick built, asbestos roofed factory, adating from circa late 1960's. The property has over the years been extensivley upgraded with reasonably high quality, two storey offices at the front, which have been double glazed and have the benefit of airconditioning units. Behind the two-storey office section, runing for approximately 1.3 of the lenght of the factory, is an area, which has also been fitted out to an office standard. Part of this area also has an air cooling/conditioning unit. The main factory area has a suspended ceiling throughout, along with florescent lighting. Part of the area is heated by way of gas fired boiler/hot water radiators and another section has a gas fired hot air blower. There is a specific loading bay section, which has the benefit of two loading doors. There is an eaves height of approximatley 13 ft. To the front of the property ia an extensive concrete yard for car parking, along with a freehold strip of land running down the side of the factory, where vehicles could also be parked. The exact boundary on this strip has yet to be determined. There is full 3-phase power to the unit. Dimensions: Approximate gross internal aeas: Ground Floor Factory 5,370 sq.ft 499 m2 Ground Floor Office 589 sq.ft 54.75 m2 First Floor Office 589 sq.ft 54.75 m2 Total Area 6,548 sq.ft 608.5 m2 Terms: The property is available on a freehold basis, and we have been asked to qoute £595,000 subject to contract. The vendor reserves the right to add VAT to the purchase price. The letting of the premises would also be considered. Viewing: By arrangement through the sole agents, Leopold Farmer. Please note: That any assignee must satisfy themselves with regards to the dimensions of the building size/site etc and that these particulars do not constitute or form any part of any offer or contract.
